subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Mini Box users.

full_text:
-------------------------------1201130750
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

A mini box? You mean radio shack ghost box hacks?
 
 
In a message dated 1/23/2008 6:13:57 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
dead.science@... writes:

 
 
 
Hi:

Would those of us that have mini boxes from Paranormal Systems  please
raise your hand? I would like to know who to send questions to  and
such that are specific to this box.
Thanks and looking forward to  working with you all.
Rob.
